alert.note: Alert for Far Northwest Highlands; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued December 16 at 1:52AM MST until December 16 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility will be locally reduced to one quarter of a mile in freezing fog. In addition to producing very low visibility, the freezing fog could deposit a thin glaze of ice on roads and other surfaces, creating slick spots for travelers, especially on bridges and overpasses. * WHERE...Far Northwest Highlands, Northwest Highlands, and Northwest Plateau. This includes portions of U.S. Highways 64 and 550. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility and slick spots on roadways could make driving conditions hazardous.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Allow extra time to reach your destination.

area.areaDesc: Far Northwest Highlands; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau
